channel.title: Observer checking Court Wizard
channel.description:
#### What happened? Was Obs, checked CW in cult game, showed no visit/vistor, but he actually warded 11. I accused and we lost the game. Thought it was Apostle, but Cult had no Apostle
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I assume it was supposed to show he visited 11 #### Steps to reproduce: Observer follow a CW who wards someone?
#### Comments: Either that or somehow CW doesn't count as visit, but I'm fairly sure it does cause I've nailed them with an empowered eradicate at least once I think.

item.title: Observer checking Court Wizard
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
What happened?

Was Obs, checked CW in cult game, showed no visit/vistor, but he actually warded 11. I accused and we lost the game. Thought it was Apostle, but Cult had no Apostle

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I assume it was supposed to show he visited 11

Steps to reproduce:

Observer follow a CW who wards someone?

Comments:

Either that or somehow CW doesn’t count as visit, but I’m fairly sure it does cause I’ve nailed them with an empowered eradicate at least once I think.

Read full topic
